title: Introduction to Yoga
brief_description: In this video, especially made for beginners, Laliita Gilbert shows us: breathing, standing exercises, relaxation techniques. This highly instructive video introduces the viewer to the benefits of the essential philosophy and preparatory techniques of yoga.
